name: Five Nights At Freddys: Chapter 1
description:
The nights at Freddy's were horrible... well they still are. Its like they combined plushies and animatronics there still horrible. Cute Fazbear, Beautiful Chica. Too bad for Monty or whos the new one...

The newest chapter of the crew

automatically is downloaded just click the button no need for a acount
